resources.string: One Million Women to Tech would like to thank Mara Catalina for two weeks of expert hands-on virtual reality and augmented reality training.
Scroll through the course screenshots and test your knowledge of AR and VR by answering the questions below.
Then come join the fun at:
Summer of Code Weeks 10 and 11 Topics
Q1. Which of the following have VR applications? (Select all that apply):
One Million Women to Tech logo
Objects created by virtual reality students
Objects created by augmented reality students
Q2. According to best practice, how many cameras should be used for AR/VR experiences?
Q3. Cloud targets are targets that exist on your account database rather than on the device?
Q4. ______________ is called when the other Collider enters the trigger.
